column1: Art Institute of Chicago////My first time here
column2: I spent all day exploring the various Impressionist collections.  But on the way out
column3: I realized I had not seen nearly 30% of the remaining rooms.  One room in particular caught my attention.  It was a massive room containing ancient sculptures and relics... what shocked me was just how cluttered the room looked
column4: there were so many art works
column5: all of them incredible and beautiful
column6: yet lost in the clutter.  Such is the size and encyclopedic nature of this museums extensive collections.  Yes
column7: the Art Institue provides a great way to spend a nice afternoon
column8: but you will certainly need more than one afternoon if you want to see everything!
